taskTitle: Port slash commands system for workflow shortcuts

subtasks.description:
Port slash commands system for workflow shortcuts

Port pi slash command system: load markdown commands from ~/.openagents/commands and .openagents/commands, parse frontmatter (description, args), substitute $@ args, and expand in CLI input. Enable common workflow shortcuts without hardcoding.
